name: Fishguise
description:
Hi! In this game, you will play as Dani the squid and fight off otamatone anglerfish that are constantly disguising themselves". That's the best I could come up with.

Massive inspiration from CALAMARI MADNESS made by FIRITH STUDIO, so go check that game out. Instructions are in game. Please report any bugs and have fun!

Click on the button "Download now" to download the game, then click "No thanks, just take me to the downloads" if you want to play the game for free. The game will opened in the browser. Please report any bugs :).
